name: VecReg
author: Nipype (interface), Oxford Centre for Functional MRI of the Brain (FMRIB) (tool)
description: VecReg, as implemented in Nipype (module: nipype.interfaces.fsl, interface: VecReg).

inputs.name: Affine mat
inputs.description: An existing file name. Filename for affine transformation matrix.

inputs.name: In file
inputs.description: An existing file name. Filename for input vector or tensor field.

inputs.name: Interpolation
inputs.description: 'nearestneighbour' or 'trilinear' or 'sinc' or 'spline'. Interpolation method : nearestneighbour, trilinear (default), sinc or spline.

inputs.name: Mask
inputs.description: An existing file name. Brain mask in input space.

inputs.name: Out file
inputs.description: A file name. Filename for output registered vector or tensor field.

inputs.name: Ref mask
inputs.description: An existing file name. Brain mask in output space (useful for speed up of nonlinear reg).

inputs.name: Ref vol
inputs.description: An existing file name. Filename for reference (target) volume.

inputs.name: Rotation mat
inputs.description: An existing file name. Filename for secondary affine matrix if set, this will be used for the rotation of the vector/tensor field.

inputs.name: Rotation warp
inputs.description: An existing file name. Filename for secondary warp field if set, this will be used for the rotation of the vector/tensor field.

inputs.name: Warp field
inputs.description: An existing file name. Filename for 4d warp field for nonlinear registration.

output-files.name: Out file
output-files.description: An existing file name. Path/name of filename for the registered vector or tensor field.
